code: @Test public void testStartupOrderClash() throws Exception {     context.addRoutes(new RouteBuilder() {          @Override         public void configure() throws Exception {             from("direct:foo").routeId("foo").startupOrder(5).to("mock:foo").             from("direct:bar").routeId("bar").startupOrder(5).noAutoStartup().to("mock:bar").         }     }).     try {         context.start().         fail("Should have thrown an exception").     } catch (FailedToStartRouteException e) {         assertEquals("Failed to start route bar because of startupOrder clash. Route foo already has startupOrder 5 configured" + " which this route have as well. Please correct startupOrder to be unique among all your routes.", e.getMessage()).     } }
